name: Sacrifice Tower
description:
Go from room to room eliminating enemies to avoid sacrifice, but failure is inevitable.

 This game was made for MiniJam 110, so if you find any bugs, sorry, we didn't have time to polish it. The game was created by two brothers, 17 and 14 years old, in their second gamejam, we hope you enjoy it.

 This game is a roguelike so each game will be different, will you be able to reach the last room and defeat the master wizard?.  Kill enemies for mana, when the mana bar is full use t or g to use a force or life boost, but if you choose one you will sacrifice the other, good luck.

Download the desktop version for a smoother experience.
